headline.main: GUARDIANS OF WORLD'S HEALTH FIND IT HARD TO QUIT SMOKING

byline.original: By THOMAS W. NETTER, Special to the New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: When Dr. Halfdan Mahler, the Director General of the World Health Organization, publicly smashed a glass ashtray in front of a crowd of his agency's employees and officials here recently, his symbolic gesture evoked a mixed response.
docs.snippet: LEAD: When Dr. Halfdan Mahler, the Director General of the World Health Organization, publicly smashed a glass ashtray in front of a crowd of his agency's employees and officials here recently, his symbolic gesture evoked a mixed response.
